parameters.query:
WITH ordered AS (
  SELECT id
  FROM prima_chat_histories
  WHERE session_id = $1
  ORDER BY id ASC
  LIMIT 2
),
total AS (
  SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt
  FROM prima_chat_histories
  WHERE session_id = $1
),
check_pair AS (
  SELECT
    SUM(CASE WHEN message->>'type' = 'human' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS human_count,
    SUM(CASE WHEN message->>'type' = 'ai' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ai_count
  FROM prima_chat_histories
  WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM ordered)
)
DELETE FROM prima_chat_histories
WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM ordered)
AND (SELECT cnt FROM total) > 6
AND (SELECT human_count FROM check_pair) = 1
AND (SELECT ai_count FROM check_pair) = 1;
